scripts.build:libs: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/tone/build/Tone.js lib/tone.js && cp node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.min.js lib/pixi.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:libs && mkdir -p dist && rsync -a --exclude node_modules --exclude ios --exclude dist --exclude .git --exclude 'VCSL-*' --exclude 'kalimba-*' --exclude palettes . dist/
